sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; // reactstrap components import { Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardHeader, Table, Container, Media, Row, Col, Progress, Button} from "reactstrap"; import Chart from "chart.js"; import { Line, Bar } from "react-chartjs-2"; // core components import { chartOptions, parseOptions, chartExample1, chartExample2 } from "variables/charts.js"; class AnalyticsHeader extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { analytics: {}, activeNav: 1, chartExample1Data: "data1" }; if (window.Chart) { parseOptions(Chart, chartOptions()); } } componentDidMount() { fetch('http://localhost:5100/api/tiktok/mystats/' + localStorage.getItem('reveleUserID')) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((responseJson) => { this.setState({ analytics: responseJson.data }); }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error); }); } render() { const { analytics } = this.state; return ( <>

Your Tiktok Metrics

Engagement {Math.round(analytics.heartCount ? parseFloat(analytics.heartCount) + parseFloat(analytics.totalCommentCount) + parseFloat(analytics.totalShareCount) / parseFloat(analytics.followerCount) : "--")}
Impressions {analytics.heartCount ? parseFloat(analytics.heartCount) + parseFloat(analytics.totalCommentCount) + parseFloat(analytics.totalShareCount) : "--"}
Reach {analytics.totalPlayCount ? analytics.totalPlayCount : "--"}
Audience {analytics.followerCount}
Followers {analytics.followerCount}
Likes {analytics.heartCount}
Following {analytics.followingCount}
Total View Count {analytics.totalPlayCount}
Total Shares {analytics.totalShareCount}
Total Comments {analytics.totalCommentCount}
Total Posts {analytics.postCount}
); } } export default AnalyticsHeader;
